WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please, for this type of question, open a «Discussion» instead of an «Issue».
WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

To perform the update flash player 18 to 19 , I pass by the AdobeFlashPlayerCatalog_SCUP.cab catalog.

But since the release of version 19 , version 18 no longer uninstalls , before I did not have this problem.

Are you seeing this?

Regards,

Elminio

Comments.Message:
No, i never see this before.
But you can us Uninstall2Install for deinstall the old version and install the new one. The HowTo is in German, but i think you will understand what the tool is doing. http://wsus.de/Uninstall2Install

Hi,

take a look here:
https://www.404techsupport.com/2015/09/flash-player-uninstall-previous/

HTH
Norbert
